snippet: The Queens kimchi belt has got to be the least explored, discussed and celebrated of the city’s great ethnic-food districts. In and near Flushing, hundreds of restaurants serve classic Korean dishes.
abstract: Pete Wells Critic's Notebook explores Korean food offerings in so-called 'Queens kimchi belt,' stretching through neighborhood of Flushing and beyond.
lead_paragraph: The Queens kimchi belt has got to be the least explored, discussed and celebrated of the city’s great ethnic-food districts. In and near Flushing, hundreds of restaurants serve classic Korean dishes.

headline.print_headline: In Queens, Kimchi Is Just the Start
headline.seo: Pete Wells Explores Korean Restaurants in Queens
headline.main: In Queens, Kimchi Is Just the Start
